description:
Recently I have started on the project that includes of series tutorial video clips on how Ableton Live and push works, introduction and basics for beginners and some advance techniques and extra tips around the subject.

This product will help people from different country whom they speak Persian language and seeking internet for music tech tutorial lessons, to benefit from the product just like the way those who understand English language and also help people who could not afford to go to professional training school or university to have this kind of one to one learning process.This project contains varies of video clips that I try to make them short and straight to the point.
title: Ableton push tutorial for Persians
